name: targetprocess-mashup-webpack-boilerplate
description: Webpack boilerplate to create Targetprocess mashup.

scripts.build:development: shx rm -rf build/development && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack/development.config.js --output-path build/development
scripts.build:library: shx rm -rf build/library && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack/library.config.js --output-path build/library --progress && npm run build:library:docs
scripts.build:manager: shx rm -rf build/manager && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack/manager.config.js --output-path build/manager --progress && cd build/manager && shx cat mashup.config.js > tmp.js && shx echo >> tmp.js && shx cat index.js >> tmp.js && shx rm mashup.config.js index.js && shx mv tmp.js index.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:library && npm run build:manager
scripts.version: npm run build:all && git add -A build

author: Targetprocess <dev@targetprocess.com>
